title: Torchwood Season 1 & 2 Complete + Declassifieds
description:
Here is the complete Season 1-2 of torchwood and the declassified episodes/documentaries.... But we've got a problem... BBC is only planning on making 5 more episodes for season 3!!! Please see the readme file for more information.

Season 1 is in .avi format because I couldn't get my hands on a high-res .mkv version. Season 2 is in .mkv format. The readme file has information on how to play the .mkv (i.e. a link to the open source VLC player), and info on what you can do to help save torchwood.

Support Torchwood.  If you like the series, get the DVDs (come on, let's pay the actors, sheesh).


Recommended player for all OS (Max OS X, Windows, Linux) is VLC.  You can also use mplayer on Linux.

Get VLC from: http://www.videolan.org/vlc/


Note: An extra file got mixed in with this torrent. Dr Who S04E09: Forest of the Dead (the 2nd part of a 2-part episode). I's a great Dr Who episode, but, this is supposed to just be a torchwood torrent... I'll continue to let this one seed, then upload a fixed version without the extra file.
